info.title: Veil API Platform
info.description: API specification for Veil API marketplace platform services

409.description: API with same path already exists

get.description: Retrieve details about a registered API

delete.description: Remove an API from the platform

post.description: Create a subscription to an API and generate an API key

get.description: List all subscriptions for the authenticated consumer
Get detailed information about a specific subscription

post.description: Generate a new API key for an existing subscription
Initialize a credit wallet for a new user with default credits

get.description: Get the current credit balance for a user
Get credit usage history for a user

put.description: Register a new API route configuration
Register a new API key for subscription validation

post.description: Create a new wallet for a user

get.description: Get the current balance for a specific wallet

post.description: Add credits to a specific wallet
Deduct credits from a specific wallet

get.description: Get transaction history for a specific wallet
Check if a wallet has sufficient credits

required_headers.description: Headers required by the provider API
Headers required by the provider API

is_variable.description: Whether value is static or dynamic

api_id.description: ID of the API to subscribe to
